plays.text: Penalty to Don Sweeney 2 minutes for Hooking Jody Hull
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Tripping Brian Rolston
Penalty to Martin Lapointe 2 minutes for Hooking Curtis Leschyshyn
Penalty to Sean Brown 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chris Neil
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Roughing Kyle McLaren
Penalty to Hal Gill 2 minutes for Roughing Chris Neil
Penalty to Bill Muckalt 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference John Grahame
Goal scored by Benoit Brunet assisted by Todd White and Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Joe Thornton 2 minutes for Slashing Radek Bonk
Penalty to Zdeno Chara 2 minutes for Roughing P.J. Axelsson
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Marian Hossa and Bill Muckalt
Goal scored by Zdeno Chara assisted by Juha Ylonen and Magnus Arvedson
Penalty to Marian Hossa 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jozef Stumpel
Goal scored by Marian Hossa assisted by Magnus Arvedson and Zdeno Chara
